divs: Sighting Details This Saucer was flying up and down like a thrown rock skimming off the water. After I saw it I went inside to ask my father to come out and see ! He refused. He read it in the San francisco Examiner the next morning. Thounsands of people saw it and reported it. TKS. Ronald Harris
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Castro Valley
There were no other sightings in Castro Valley on or around June 10th 1952
Summary: It was disk shaped and fast moving. Flying from the west to the east at about 600 mi.per. hr.
